Articles.Content:
Hey there. I just wanted to say I'm totally addicted to this game. I discovered it right before Christmas and can't stop playing it. I'm finding out I like space planes a bit more than the rockets, but landing on the Mun and Minmus was certainly awesome.

I've been lurking on the forums a bit and finally decided to hop on board. Look forward to sharing ideas with all of you!
Welcome to the forums and the game, too!
Thanks FenrirWolf! I'm looking forward to countless hours spent exploring the Kerbalverse.

Thanks FenrirWolf! I'm looking forward to countless hours spent exploring the Kerbalverse.

Nice! I discovered this game a few months ago, but a week or two ago, I decided to get it.
Have fun and learn a lot while playing, too!
